description:
Everyone at the disco is busting out wild moves when Sakura invites Lum and Ataru along to see if her new magician boyfriend is all he`s cracked up to be. Meanwhile, Kurama plans to have Ataru molded into the perfect partner by a "real man."
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I due pretendenti - L`esempio di Wakamaru
Koi no Battle Royale / Chichi yo Anata wa Tsuyokatta
Love Battle Royale / Father, You Were Strong
Ronny le chevalier / Père, tu fus si fort
恋の バトルロイヤル - 父よあなたは 強かった
